dt: {bc}an airtight, usually small electrical appliance for quick cooking of foods by means of {d_link|convection|convection} currents circulated rapidly by a fan

dt.t: Contrary to the name, an {wi}air fryer{/wi} doesn't fry food. It's a compact kitchen appliance that circulates hot air around the food to cook it …
{wi}Air fryers{/wi} create a crispy coating on foods using minimal oil by way of convection.

shortdef: an airtight, usually small electrical appliance for quick cooking of foods by means of convection currents circulated rapidly by a fan
a utensil suitable for deep-fat frying

dt: {bc}a machine used to fry food in deep fat
